channel.title: Freeze in taverly?
channel.description:
i always get this problem on all the PI's i have worked with. when i walk through taverly i get this error in client
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3722 at Animable_Sub5.method457(Animable_Sub5.java:52) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:38) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:13) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1533) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1040) at client.method146(client.java:14407) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9283) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10453) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:161) at client.run(client.java:5291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
i have only been able to fix it once by changing code in method562 in ondemandfetcher.java but when i tried on deathlypvpz it did not work i dont understand this problem is there another way to fix it?

item.title: Freeze in taverly?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

i always get this problem on all the PIâ€™s i have worked with. when i walk through taverly i get this error in client

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3722 at Animable_Sub5.method457(Animable_Sub5.java:52) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:38) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:13) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1533) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1040) at client.method146(client.java:14407) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9283) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10453) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:161) at client.run(client.java:5291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

i have only been able to fix it once by changing code in method562 in ondemandfetcher.java
but when i tried on deathlypvpz it did not work i dont understand this problem is there another way to fix it?
